message: If anyone is interested and has the right skills, I know of a place that is looking to hack together a keycard entry system. Message me @mik3cap if you're serious and want details.
I'm interested but don't have the time right now.  I don't want you to think that this posting went unnoticed.
Mike, I've got limited skills, but if it pays well, I can do anything... I'm better at hacking "apart" than hacking together, but "a few beers and ANYONE's president!" (anon.)
